detail_desc: Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch. Pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
Nursing dress in a supersoft fine knit with a gentle wrapover V-neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fluffy yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a kangaroo pocket and press-studs at the crotch.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem. Fleece lining.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small, lace stand-up collar, button placket and lace section at the top. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Cropped, boxy-style top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and short sleeves. Inset lace trims across the top of the front and lace trims around the sleeves and at the front of the hem.
Glasses chain in chunky, textured metal chain with plastic loop fasteners. Can also be worn as a necklace. Length 80 cm.
Patterned pyjama bottoms in a soft, airy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Shorter top in a stretch weave with double spaghetti straps and a sewn-in wrapover with a draped front. Lined at the front.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with side pockets and fake welt pockets at the back. Wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and slits in the sides.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Oversized, straight-cut T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Push-up bra in mesh-lined lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that join at the back and a metal fastener at the front.
Trousers in a patterned weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Top in soft jersey with a motif on the front, a round neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a matching tie belt. Collar and concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, buttoned cuffs and loops at the waist.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.

Short cold shoulder dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Flounce with narrow elastication at the top over the sleeves, and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top and ties at the waist. Flounced hem. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Lined hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar with gathers and a V-neck opening at the front. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, short raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Fully lined, scallop-trimmed swimsuit with adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts and concealed elastication under the bust for extra support. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.
Fitted, stretch, turtleneck top with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a wide smocked seam under the bust.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded hem.
Rib-knit hat with an appliqué on the turned-up hem and a faux fur pompoms at the top.
Cropped sports vest top in jersey with a racer back and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and silk blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
Fitted, long-sleeved body in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, low-cut back and press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Double-layered hat and tube scarf in fine-knit wool. Small imitation leather appliqué above the hem of both the hat and scarf.

Body in microfibre and lace with a gentle shaping effect on the tummy, seat and back. V-neck with transparent lace sections at the sides, adjustable shoulder straps and glued edges for a smoother silhouette. String back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.
Metal snake chain waist belt with a decorative, shell-shaped buckle and concealed hook-and-eye fastening.
Skirt in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Waist with covered elastication, a gathered top edge and a decorative bow with tassels at the front. Glittery tulle frill trim at the hem.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Cap in a patterned weave with an appliqué at the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Sweatband in woven fabric.
Fitted, long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft jersey.

Jacket in a crisp weave with a lined hood, high collar and elastic drawstring. Zip down the front and front pockets with a concealed zip. Long sleeves with covered elastication and an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in washed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Jacquard-knit hat containing glittery threads with a pompom on the top, ear-flaps and braided ties. Fleece lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, narrow sides with a twisted detail and medium coverage at the back.

All-in-one suit in a soft cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems. The cotton content of the all-in-one suit is organic.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine-knit silk and cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a high waist, fly with visible buttons, fake front pockets and slim, ankle-length legs with cut-off hems.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, hood with a decorative drawstring, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

prod_name: TP BOSSE fancy OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Hat in a soft, fine cotton knit with a ribbed hem.

Straight-cut blouse in a softly draping silk and viscose weave with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and yoke with a pleat. Long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Set with a hat and tube scarf in a soft jacquard knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top and a ribbed hem. Tube scarf with a ribbed trim top and bottom.
Satin-covered Alice band with a decorative witch’s hat in felted fabric, a satin rose and glittery mesh ribbon at the top.
Slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and a heel strap with covered elastication. Leather insoles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, a zipped chest pocket, a zipped side pocket and a small, decorative flap with a press-stud. Tab with a press-stud at the sides. Lined.
Small handbag made of plastic beads with a handle at the top. Lined. Size 6x16x20 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front and an opening at the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
